messages.subject: kids and porn
messages.msgSnippet: Hello. I think this is an issue to be aware of for our kids and so appreciate you putting this out there. What an amazing gift for all of us to think about and
messages.messageBody:
Hello.

I think this is an issue to be aware of for our kids and so appreciate
you putting this out there. What an amazing gift for all of us to
think about and discuss.
I also think that it would be helpful to address it with the child
as a mistake that may have happened on the computer as the 14 yr old had
told
his mom so there could be open discussion about it. I once went to
what I thought was a library site but it was .com vs .org and got a porn
site
and I was so frazzled.
I recently picked up the book called Boy Talk and opened it to
a page that discussed boys and pornography. It was addressing
the issue of boys being exposed to pornography early in their lives and
not understanding
what was going on in their bodies as a response to this and that this
experience
could be a jump off for them
of how they address their sexuality now and in the future.

A group of us just got together to discuss the new emerging changes
with our kids specific to sexuality. I appreciate the replies to the posts
thus far as I am continuing to ponder these ideas as my son is growing to
the teen years..

Kathy
